gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 108, 76ers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the 76ers, 108-107. Kawhi Leonard made big plays down the stretch for the Clippers as he recorded 17 points, nine rebounds and two blocks, while Paul George added a team-high 22 points, along with a season-high 10 rebounds in the victory. Tyrese Maxey led all scorers with 26 points, along with seven rebounds and eight assists for the 76ers in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 45-27 on the season, while the 76ers fall to 39-34.
